questions.question: True or False : A hot spot is a place where magma can rise from the mantle.
True or False : Alfred Wegener's main flaw in his theory of continental drift was not knowing by what means any of the continents moved (floated) apart.
True or False : The name of the super continent formed by all the continents is Pangea.
True or False : One of Alfred Wegener's pieces of evidence when trying to prove his theory of continental drift was mid-ocean ridges forming at the bottom of the ocean.
True or False : Alfred Wegener's theory (continental drift) was that at one point all the continents were together in a single landmass and they eventually drifted apart.
True or False : One of Alfred Wegener's pieces of evidence when trying to prove his theory of continental drift was matching fossils on different continents that are far away now.
True or False : The mantle is the densest layer of the Earth.
True or False : The inner core is a liquid ball of metal.
True or False : The mantle is the thickest layer of all the earth's layers.
True or False : Divergent boundaries are where two tectonic plates move into (or towards) each other.
True or False : The discovery of mid-ocean ridges was one of the first things that started to prove Alfred Wegener's theory is correct.
True or False : The lithosphere is made up of the bottom part of the mantle.
True or False : Seafloor spreading is the process that creates underwater mountain ranges (mid-ocean ridges).
True or False : Mid-ocean ridges form when magma leaks through a plate boundary.
True or False : The heat that makes convection currents happen comes from the lithosphere.
True or False : Mountains form when 2 oceanic plates diverge.
True or False : All humans live on the top layer of the Earth (the crust).
True or False : Convergent boundaries are where two tectonic plates move apart.
True or False : When two continental plates converge it creates a mountain.
True or False : Subduction is when one tectonic plate goes under another.
True or False : Earthquakes commonly occur at transform boundaries.
True or False : Magma is melted rock above the surface of the Earth.
True or False : A volcano is an opening in the Earth's crust that erupts molten rock hot gases and rock fragments.
